 A transitivity relation.  (Read A < B and ` -. ` C < B implies A < C .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
statement:
soi.1 $e |- R Or S $.
soi.2 $e |- R C_ ( S X. S ) $.
sotri3 $p |- ( ( C e. S /\ A R B /\ -. C R B ) -> A R C ) $.
